document.full_text: the conflict in libya has been, by almost any human measure, a sorrow, with thousands of people killed, but, among the many emotions are moments of relief, like that in the airport hangar on thursday, as the siege of misurata appeared to be nearing an end.
document.title: at war: for libyan rebels, a light moment in a doleful war
lines_and_colors: the conflict in libya has been, by almost any human measure, a sorrow, with thousands of people killed, but, among the many emotions are moments of relief, like that in the airport hangar on thursday, as the siege of misurata appeared to be nearing an end.
